product_name: Black Diamond Slider Ice Axe Leash
long_description: A simple, streamlined leash with colored, tightly-woven nylon webbing that's ideal for general mountaineering ice axes as well as technical ice axes. An aluminum barrel slides down the leash to cinch the wrist loop tight and clean off ice and snow.
short_description: A simple, streamlined leash with colored, tightly-woven nylon webbing that's ideal for general mountaineering ice axes as well as technical ice axes.
